forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 49, with temperatures rising to around 51 overnight. Southeast wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. East wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
In the hush of the early morning, Downtown San Francisco is swathed in a gentle cocoon of almost clouded serenity, offering glimpses into a day beginning to awaken. The low light casts a soft halo around the city, hinting at the emerging warmth, as temperatures creep up from a brisk 49 degrees to embrace a cooler yet pleasant 61 by afternoon. The easterly winds whisper softly at around six miles per hour, adding a breath of clarity, though the bustling energy that characterizes the city is momentarily latent under a veil of clouds.

As the day unfolds, expect patches of sun to break through, possibly showing a glimpse of the Golden Gate Bridge, juxtaposed against the thick marine layer that stubbornly hugs its iconic structure. The atmosphere hints at a subtle fog, primarily lingering in the coastal areas—a reminder of nature's delicate interplay. For those navigating the city, layering will be your friend; a light jacket may be necessary as you make your way to a nearby café for a morning coffee, or perhaps while wandering through a local bookstore that beckons with the promise of unwritten stories. Embrace the tranquility of today, where the fog may obscure, but also invites moments of quiet contemplation in the heart of this vibrant city.
